Job title: Assistant QC Scientist
Duration: 06 months
Location: East Syracuse, NY 13057
Shift timings: 6PM - 6AM

Job description:
Perform Quality Control testing for in-process, release, stability, water, and raw material in a cGMP environment.
It is preferred that the candidate have analytical experience using Waters HPLC, UV-Vis spectrophotometer, AKTA Explorer, and total organic carbon analyzer.
The successful candidate will also perform other key activities such as data review, ensuring laboratory cGMP compliance is maintained, execution of technical transfer and co validation activities, instrumentation verification/preventative maintenance, assisting with laboratory investigations, writing procedures and technical documents as required, and providing communication of business critical information to operations and Quality Control management.
